Module com.pizza_group.project4
Package com.pizza_group.project4

Class ChicagoStylePizzaController

java.lang.Object
com.pizza_group.project4.ChicagoStylePizzaController
public class ChicagoStylePizzaController extends Object
A controller class that handles all GUI operations in order to allow users to fully create a Chicago Style Pizza and add it to their order.
Author:
Alexis Wilson, James Alba

  • Constructor Details

    • ChicagoStylePizzaController

      public ChicagoStylePizzaController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      The initialize method populates flavors into combo box and automatically picks "Build Your Own" flavor.

    • changeImage

      public void changeImage()
      Changes the image displayed to the image of the flavor picked

    • createMainController

      public void createMainController(MainController mainController)
      createMainController makes the current controller as the main one for the user. Also, invokes the initialize method to populate window with appropriate information.
      Parameters:
      mainController - passed in object to set controller as main

    • defaultSettings

      public void defaultSettings()
      Sets certain elements to appropriate state for flavors BBQChicken, Meatzza, and Deluxe.

    • switchFlavors

      public void switchFlavors()
      switchFlavors() gets the value of the flavor selection and invokes the appropiate methods for each flavor. Also, depending on the flavor, invokes a method to set disable/enable elements

    • changeFlavorToBuildYourOwn

      public void changeFlavorToBuildYourOwn()
      changeFlavorToBuildYourOwn() sets settings for specific build your own functions, creates pizza, and populates list view of toppings. Also changes image and updates price

    • changeFlavorToBBQChicken

      public void changeFlavorToBBQChicken()
      changeFlavorToBBQChicken() sets up information in the topping view and crust output, and creates the pizza. Also, changes images and updates price output.

    • changeFlavorToMeatzza

      public void changeFlavorToMeatzza()
      changeFlavorToMeatzza() sets up information in the topping view and crust output, and creates the pizza. Also, changes images and updates price output.

    • changeFlavorToDeluxe

      public void changeFlavorToDeluxe()
      changeFlavorToDeluxe() sets up information in the topping view and crust output, and creates the pizza. Also, changes images and updates price output.

    • changeSizeToMedium

      public void changeSizeToMedium()
      Sets the size of the pizza to medium if the medium toggle is picked. Also, updates price.

    • changeSizeToLarge

      public void changeSizeToLarge()
      Sets the size of the pizza to large if the large toggle is picked. Also, updates price.

    • changeSizeToSmall

      public void changeSizeToSmall()
      Sets the size of the pizza to small if the large toggle is picked. Also, updates price.

    • updatePriceOutput

      public void updatePriceOutput()
      Calls pizza method to get the price of the current pizza and displays it in the price display text field.

    • addToppings

      public void addToppings()
      addToppings() allows the selected topping be added to the selected toppings list view if user has less than 7 toppings. Otherwise, sends appropriate alerts to inform user.

    • removeTopping

      public void removeTopping()
      Removes a topping if there is available toppings to remove. Then, updates counter of toppings and price.

    • addToOrder

      public void addToOrder()
      Calls order list from main controller method and add pizza to running order. Then, displays an alert that says order was successfully added.
